products.title: Perforated Steel Filtra Perfect Fit
products.metadescription: This perforated steel filtra perfect fit blind, is a combination of their metal venetian blind and perfect fit frame to create an ideal blind for your upvc windows and doors. No screws, no drilling - innovative fixings.

products.title: Filtra Silver (Perforated)
products.metadescription: Buy made to measure filtra silver (perforated) perfect fit venetian blinds from soeasy blinds. Order quality perfect fit venetian blinds online today at low prices with fast uk delivery
products.productdescription:
Min width: 180mm max width: 1300mm
 	min drop: 140mm max drop: 2000mm
 	slat composition: aluminium
 	slat widths available: 25mm
 	guarantee: 12 months
 	controls: tensioned (lift bottom bar to raise/lower blind, wand to tilt slats).
